messages.content: That’s why it’s so refreshing to see what the Liberal Democrats are planning, to help people like me get on the first step of the property ladder without needing a deposit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats plan to enable people trying to get on the property ladder could 'rent to buy', meaning no need for a deposit.

housing.content: Plan enables 'rent to buy', meaning no need for a deposit, which will be huge for people like me trying to buy their first home.

leaflet.personalStatement: The stress of starting out on your own and getting your first place – free of mum and dad. I dreamed about owning my own home for years. It just feels like no-one is really trying to help me get on in life - in fact it often feels like the exact opposite.

contactInformation.address: Printed by [illegible text], Sefton Park, Printon, Brent, Essex BR5 9SS. Published and promoted by T. Gower on behalf of the Liberal Democrats, at 16 Great Smith Street, London, SW1P 3AZ

leaflet.additionalNotes: Only the Liberal Democrats have a credible plan to help people get on the property ladder without needing a deposit.
